name: wavespeed
description: Generate and edit images and videos using WaveSpeed AI's 700+ model library
author: al1enjesus

skill.name: wavespeed
skill.description: Generate and edit images and videos using WaveSpeed AI's 700+ model library. Use when the user wants to generate images from text prompts (FLUX, Seedream, Qwen), edit or retouch photos (nano-banana-pro/edit keeps faces identical while changing clothes/background), generate videos from images or text (Kling, Veo, Sora, Wan, Hailuo), or upscale videos to 4K.
